2/ His life sets the standard for the character and patriotism essential to true public service. As we remember him, we take comfort in knowing that he has been reunited with his beloved wife Barbara and is free now from all sickness and pain in the loving arms of our Lord.

1/ Like many in his generation, George H.W. Bush embodied such decency that even politics and ambition could not overcome it. He was a good man. He loved his family and his country and worked to keep both safe and sound.
